greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: One-based column index of n in array A255555.
comment: Equally: One-based row index of n in array A255557.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
formula: a(1) = 1; for n > 1, if A213714(n) = 0 [i.e., if n is one of the terms of A055938], then a(n) = 1, otherwise 1 + a(A213714(n)-1).
In other words, a(1) = 1, and for n > 1, if n = A005187(k) for some k, then a(n) = 1 + a(k-1), otherwise it must be that n is in A055938, in which case a(n) = 1.
Other identities and observations. For all n >= 1:
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 14 2015
